top.title: US pursuing third oil tanker linked to Venezuela, official says
top.summary: The move comes days after President Donald Trump said that he was ordering a blockade of sanctioned oil tankers entering and leaving Venezuela.

top.title: In rebel-held Myanmar, civilians face devastating air strikes and a sham election
top.summary: The BBC goes to a rebel-held part of Myanmar, ahead of a government-mandated election starting this month.

top.title: Another 130 abducted schoolchildren released in Nigeria
top.summary: Nigerian authorities confirm the remaining students kidnapped from a Catholic school last month have been freed.

top.title: Will the US TikTok deal make it safer but less relevant?
top.summary: The key to the app's success - its algorithm - is to be retrained on US data. Will that make US TikTok blander?

top.title: TikTok owner signs deal to avoid US ban
top.summary: The deals would end years of efforts by Washington to force ByteDance to sell its US operations.

top.title: UK to ban deepfake AI 'nudification' apps
top.summary: A new offence looks to build on existing rules outlawing sexually explicit deepfakes and intimate image abuse.
